title: Are distance education bachelors valid for a PR in Canada? - Quora

response.answer_text: I dont think so.. Its valid because i applied transcript for my wife for her Masters distance education and it was not considered at all. However, it depends on what kind of course and which University you have done with. Better to obtain transcript and apply. But dont consider any score while calculating CRS. If you get few points, that will be a bonus. Hope this helps ! Nitin

I have seen many distance learning programs getting equivalency. It totally depends on which University did you pursue bachelors from, and where are you getting the ECA from. IQAS tends to be more lenient than WES. Get you ECA done and you’ll have your answer. You won’t be able to get a confirmation from anywhere else. Good Luck!

Get an evaluation from WES/ECA Canada. This been said some distance learning are accredited and approved to grant degrees and some are just diploma mills. If it happens to be a diploma mill it will not be accepted and it could be fraudulent as well.

Nobody can tell here. There are too many factors - but the biggest is how well your tests were supervised. If they accpted your test results from home - rest assured, you degree is worthless. But - you must find out. Start here: Where can I get an Educational Credential Assessment (ECA)?
